sentences.sentence: Objective:TO observe the growth of the cells in thymuses from newborn mice in condition of organ culture.
sentences.translation: 目的：观察器官培养的新生小鼠胸腺内细胞的生长状况。

sentences.sentence: The cells in center part of the thymuses were arranged loosely, and small part of the cells were normal in shape and structure, most parts of the cells showed death state.
sentences.translation: 胸腺中间部的细胞排列较松散，少部分形态结构正常，大部分呈死亡状态。
